attributes.action: For Westminster to take back control of UK governance.
attributes.additional_details: Devolved Governments are purposely presenting obstacles to central government in an attempt to dilute Brexit and have proved to be an unnecessary expense to the taxpayer of Scotland and Wales
attributes.background: Take back control of the devolved parliaments and control of all UK cities currently under mayoral control, as the UK needs unification for Brexit to work

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We understand you want the Westminster Government to reserve more powers over UK-wide policymaking, but we're not clear exactly how you want this to happen.

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Hold a referendum on returning devolved powers to the UK Government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333012

Hold Welsh referendum to return power to the UK government.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318516

You could also start a new petition calling for local referendums on the removal of the positions of city region mayors in England, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
